body_html:
It turns out that for my machine (sandybridge), tensorflow v1.9.0 is not built with MKL BLAS support. This seems fixed by 64117da .
I tested the latest version, there is no more this problem.
Thank you!

It turns out that for my machine (sandybridge), tensorflow v1.9.0 is not built with MKL BLAS support. This seems fixed by 64117da .

Thank you!
body:
It turns out that for my machine (sandybridge), tensorflow v1.9.0 is not built with MKL BLAS support. This seems fixed by https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/64117da0c36f0697467ce6d56a7be6837da24d2f .
I tested the latest version, there is no more this problem.
Thank you!
